name: Finding Report
description: Finding events report the results of detections or analytics.

end_time.description: The time of the most recent event included in the findings report.

labels.description:
The list of category labels attached to the event or specific attributes. Labels are user defined tags or aliases added at normalization time.

For example: ["network", "connection.ip:destination", "device.ip:source"]

message.description: The description of the finding report.

observables.description: The observables associated with the finding report.

start_time.description: The time of the least recent event included in the finding report.

time.description: The time when the finding was created.
